items.name: Abyssal Blade
items.description: A dark blade forged from the essence of the Abyss. Deals extra damage to shadow creatures.

attributes.special_effect: Increases damage against shadow enemies by 30%

items.location: Found in the Abyssal Keep after defeating the Shadow Warden.

items.name: Phoenix Feather
items.description: A rare feather said to be imbued with the power of the Phoenix. Used in powerful resurrection potions.
items.location: Dropped by the Phoenix King in the Flamecore Mountains.

locations.name: Enchanted Forest
locations.description: A mystical forest filled with ancient trees and hidden creatures. Known for its powerful healing herbs.

locations.name: Ruins of Eldara
locations.description: The crumbled remnants of a once great city, now haunted by the spirits of its former inhabitants.

enemies.name: Flame Golem

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Throws a fireball that deals massive damage to the player.

abilities.name: Lava Slam
abilities.description: Smashes the ground, causing lava to erupt and deal damage in an area.

enemies.location: Located in the Lava Crater, just before the path to the Fire Temple.

enemies.name: Elder Specter

abilities.name: Phantom Strike
abilities.description: A quick strike that hits multiple times, draining the player's stamina.

abilities.name: Soul Siphon
abilities.description: Drains a small amount of health from the player with each hit.

enemies.location: Found in the Ruins of Eldara, near the ancient statue.

spells.name: Ice Shard
spells.description: Fires a shard of ice at the enemy, freezing them in place for a short duration.

spells.name: Healing Aura
spells.description: Surrounds the caster with a healing aura, restoring health to all allies within range.

quests.title: The Phoenix's Blessing
quests.description: Find the Phoenix Feather and return it to the High Priest in Eldora to receive a powerful blessing.
objectives: Locate the Phoenix King in the Flamecore Mountains.
Return to the High Priest in Eldora.

quests.title: Echoes of the Past
quests.description: Investigate the Ruins of Eldara and uncover the secrets hidden within the underground labyrinth.
objectives: Find the entrance to the underground labyrinth.
Solve the puzzle inside the labyrinth.
